translations.Title: Title
translations.Please select at least one user or group: Please select at least one user or group!
translations.Click on days to add or remove: Click on days to add or remove
translations.Select hour & minute, then click on time: Select hour & minute, then click on time
No comments yet. Be the first.
translations.Do you really want to delete that poll?: Do you really want to delete that poll?
translations.You must enter at least a title for the: You must enter at least a title for the new poll.
translations.Thanks that you've voted. You can close: Thanks that you've voted. You can close the page now.
translations.Nothing selected!\nClick on cells to tur:
Nothing selected!
Click on cells to turn them green.
translations.You are not registered.\nPlease enter yo:
You are not registered.
Please enter your name to vote
(at least 3 characters!)
translations.You already have an item with the same t: You already have an item with the same text
translations.Please choose the groups or users you wa: Please choose the groups or users you want to add to your poll.
translations.Description (will be shown as tooltip on: Description (will be shown as tooltip on the summary page)
translations.The poll expired on %s. Voting is disabl: The poll expired on %s. Voting is disabled, but you can still comment.
translations.You are not allowed to view this poll or: You are not allowed to view this poll or the poll does not exist.
